Greetings from CPP


Format:
Physical Print | Luster and Matte Stock | Postcard Series

Client:
Cal Poly Pomona - Self-Study

Role:

Creative Director,
Photographer,
Print Technician,
Package Designer,

scroll for more

About:



Conceptual product demonstrating the viability of postcards as merchandise for California State Polytechnic University Pomona.

Problem:



With an already saturated merchandise portfolio, how can Cal Poly Pomona innovate with a new merchandise item that catches the interests of its students and external audience?

Solution:



Create a postcard series that showcases the beauty of the suburban landscape of Cal Poly Pomona. The reason postcards were chosen was because the university did not have this already and it seemed practical to have such an item for students and alumni to share their campus spirit with others far away.

Result:



Brought a new possible item into realization for the universityâ€™s merchandise portfolio. Upon presenting the proof of concept, this item received high praise.

Thanks for reading!
